title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 225.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 225.1 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) 'Moveable
soccer goal'' shall mean a freestanding structure consisting of at least two
upright posts, a crossbar, and support bars that is designed: (1)
to be used by adults or children for the
purposes of a soccer goal; (2)
to
be used without any other form of support or restraint other than pegs, stakes, or other forms of temporary anchoring device; and
(3)
to be able to be moved to different
locations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
225.1

Renumbered
from 4608.1 of title 21

New

York State Register May 2, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 18, eff. 5/2/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
